S.FORM: Sergio Mattarella 7 bulad 23 demiad, Sergio Mattarella, u misingkiway. 1941 a mihca nalecuhan u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung nu Italy ayza sa ci Sergio Mattarella, micakat a demiad sa i 2015 a mihca 2 bulad 3 demiad. malalitin tu ihekalay atu zumaay a natinengan List of current heads of state and government
